mapper.select: SELECT notice_num, notice_name, notice_option, notice_content, notice_date, FROM NOTICE WHERE notice_num = #{noticeNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( notice_num, notice_name, notice_option, notice_content, notice_date ) VALUES ( noticenum_seq.NEXTVAL, #{noticeName}, #{noticeOption}, #{noticeContent}, sysdate )
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICE SET notice_name = #{noticeName}, notice_option = #{noticeOption}, notice_content = #{noticeContent} WHERE notice_num = #{noticeNum}
